data.title: Boutique Accommodation & Wedding Venue
data.meta_description: Nestled within the South Yorkshire countryside, Hooton Pagnell Hall is a timeless, yet elegant Grade II* listed luxury, boutique accommodation and wedding venue.
data.text:
Nestled within the South Yorkshire countryside, not too Far from Doncaster, but deep within the green rolling hills, Hooton Pagnell Hall is a timeless, yet elegant Grade II* listed luxury boutique bed and breakfast, wedding and events venue.

We’ve opened the doors to this very special family home, so your wedding can find its own belonging here. Just imagine wandering through our splendid gardens on long sunny days, taking your vows in our magical and truly romantic settings, and enjoying the relaxing experience of creating a wedding day that is undeniably yours.

A warm Yorkshire welcome

As a private family home, Hooton Pagnell Hall remains an exclusive secret. A hidden gem that provides the most spectacular backdrop to your wedding day.

Discover our Estate’s history and learn more about bespoke weddings with our unique and relaxed approach to designing your memorable wedding day

From curling up by the fire in our Boutique Accommodation with a cup of tea to experiencing a delicious Yorkshire dining experience at the local Gastro-Restaurant, ‘1903’. Perhaps taking a stroll through the stone-cottage village is your preferred option. Hooton Pagnell Hall is your perfect home-from-home.

A relaxing, refreshing countryside wedding experience.

Weddings and celebrations at Hooton Pagnell Hall are special in their own way.

Our relaxed, yet exclusive nature means that we don’t have set packages, instead, we work with you to create a bespoke wedding, with a bespoke quotation, which will be fitting with your requirements only.

Your love story is your own, and we feel that should be reflected in your celebrations.

At Hooton Pagnell Hall, we host a limited amount of weddings year-round. Each is wonderful and we love seeing your plans come together. For a bespoke quote and to book a viewing, we would be so delighted to hear from you.
